SVGAnimatedBoolean.summary: The SVGAnimatedBoolean interface is used for attributes of type boolean which can be animated.

SVGAnimatedBooleanBaseVal.summary: The baseVal property of the interface is the value of the associated animatable boolean SVG attribute in its base (none-animated) state. It reflects the value of the associated animatable boolean attribute when no animations are applied.

remarks.para: Some boolean SVG attributes, such as preserveAlpha, are animatable. In such cases, SVGAnimatedBoolean.baseVal property is false when the attribute is set to false, is omitted and defaults to false, or is inheritable and inherits false. Otherwise, the value is true.

SVGAnimatedBooleanBaseVal.value: A boolean; the base value of the reflected attribute.

SVGAnimatedBooleanAnimVal.summary: The animVal read-only property of the interface represents the current animated value of the associated animatable boolean SVG attribute. If the attribute is not animated, animVal is the same as .

remarks.para: Some boolean SVG attributes, such as preserveAlpha, are animatable. In such cases, SVGAnimatedBoolean.animVal property is true when the attribute value resolves to true. Otherwise, the value is false.

SVGAnimatedBooleanAnimVal.value: A boolean; the value of the animatable boolean attribute.
